body.name: DoorbellBoa Anti-Theft Video Doorbell Door Mount, No Tools or Installation, Mounts Securely in Seconds, Compatible with Ring & Other Video Doorbells (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 40 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 13 hrs 40 mins
features: FAST, EASY, SECURE – Put a video doorbell in any home. Great for houses, apartments, rentals, dorms, businesses and much more! Video doorbells fit perfectly inside! Door must swing inward and be no more than 2 inches thick.

NO TOOLS OR INSTALLATION REQUIRED – Attaches securely in seconds and easily installs and uninstalls so that you can take it with you or move locations easily. Simply place video doorbell inside and slide onto your front door!
ENCASE YOUR VIDEO DOORBELL – DoorBellBoa encases your video doorbell securely, making it perfect for situations where you cannot install a video doorbell due to property damage fines.

ANTI-THEFT DESIGN – It cannot be removed from the side of your door unless the door is open, making DoorbellBoa and your video doorbell impossible to be stolen while your door is closed. It’s a new level of security for renters and video doorbells!

COMPATIBLE VIDEO DOORBELLS – Many of the world’s most popular non-wired, battery-operated video doorbells fit perfectly inside to help protect consumer’s homes and the video doorbell itself. Works with Amazon’s Ring 1,2,3, &3 Plus, Blink Cam, Arlo, Eufy Battery and multiple wireless generic brands.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing the All-New Breakthrough DoorbellBoa! The first hassle-free, secure door mount that makes it easy for EVERYBODY to experience the life-changing security and convenience of a doorbell camera. NO TOOLS. NO SCREWS. NO WIRES!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and Amazing
reviews.reviewText: We cannot drill anything as we rent. At first I didn’t understand how the back pieces fit, but the video helped a lot. It’s snug on the door and doesn’t hinder the view or sound on our Ring doorbell. It was easy and it works perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Our Ring doorbell did not fit where the original doorbell was located. This solved the problem. Great quality and works as intended. Our Ring Pro fits perfectly with the included pads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was nervous at first because my husband installed it and he went out of town and I had to remove it, but it was so easy to install

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Read *carefully* before buying
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I want to start by saying this seems like an excellent and very sturdy doorbell mount, no issues with the product itself. However, if your door swings OUTWARD this will not work. Your door has to swing inward in order for this to work. That’s with every doorbell mount of this style. I didn’t realize until it was already delivered and i tried to install it, as you can see in the video, my door won’t close completely and it won’t lock at all so i cannot use it. I was frustrated so i went back to the product page and realized it says “can only be used with inward swinging door” It’s my fault for not reading everything and just impulsively purchasing but I want to save anyone else the hassle and waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The anti-theft device works under the right conditions
reviews.reviewText: I had some unique conditions for install. I was wanting to install on a gate directly in front of my door. The mesh is sturdy thick metal but much thinner than a door is, even at the framing, where the gate is the thickest. Aside from that, the molding on the doorway was too close for this item so i had to Dremel off a small portion and completely remove the metal hook, which is a security feature on the item to make room. I also needed to purchase a piece of wood to mimic the door thickness on the gate. All that being done, the item seems to be working great and just barely fits an Arlo doorbell but it fits and it works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Safety Mount!
reviews.reviewText: Got the right mount because it fit my Zumimall doorbell. Has different sized foam inserts that need to be placed around the doorbell In the mount. In my case, I only needed the side mounts as the top and bottom spaces of my doorbell were too tight to squeeze anything into those places. I have no issues whatsoever with opening or closing the door. I definitely, would suggest buying this to my friends, neighbors, and family. It's big but I think it looks great and I feel like it protects my doorbell from being stolen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not for NYC Apt doors
reviews.reviewText: Great product, just not for my door. It did not fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Product Has Design Flaws - Customer Service Sucks
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Doorbell Boa because I wanted to patronize the original product but man their customer service sucks when it comes to replacement. I purchased the product on March 14, 2022 from Amazon and the product was delivered quickly.3 Months after using the doorbell boa, a first incident happened: a homeless person tried to yank my Doorbell Boa from my business door but was unsuccessful in removing it. However he was able to bend the case enough to face outward to the right. I tried to bend the metal casing back to shape hoping that they won’t attempt to try again next day and hoping i can contact doorbell boa's customer service about it on the first business day (Monday). I put the case back with the bottom going under the door handrail so that the person will have a hard time prying it out of the door because the handrail is against it so it will make it harder to take out. But on the following day after the first incident (Sunday morning) another homeless person was finally able to yank it out using a crow bar and took out my Ring video doorbell, all while i watch and scream at him while he’s doing it. I did report him to the police and he got caught about an hour later. The next day (Monday), I reported it to the first customer service and I was told to contact another company to report the incident and process a replacement. I immediately emailed the company as instructed and got an answer back same day. That was June 13th. The email then asked me to send the shipping address to which I immediately replied. I even offered to send the broken pieces so they can perhaps improve their design but they did not reply. Now, more than a month later, I still do not have my replacement and I still haven't put my ring video doorbell back. I would not recommend this because if something happens to your doorbell boa, you cannot rely on the company to help you out with a simple replacement.

Was worried that it would not work because of the measurements of the video doorbell I bought (Eufy model 2K) compared to the huge hole in this Doorbell Boa: the doorbell seemed so small that it would fall through the hole… but not at all, with the variety of foams included I was able to adjust it perfectly in the middle with no foam on the bottom part to allow the microphone to work. Then, I pretended I was a burglar and tried to remove it by trying to push the foam: impossible! Proceeded to install it on my door: very easy, works perfectly. Wanted a product that could work with different brands of video doorbells in case I want to upgrade in the future for a newer model or different brand and I did not want to drill any holes in my brick wall for the same reason: this product is THE solution I needed, for the present and the future!

I bought this for my Eufy doorbell cam. There were guidelines in the package on which foam to use for Eufy but mine is a slimmer model so have to use extra pieces on the side to secure the doorbell. Other than the extra padding, the rest of the installation was easy. I do get pivotal view of my entrance after the installation which is good. One think I notice though is the door mount has added thickness to my door and resulted in tiny gaps between the door and the weather strip; we will have to apply extra weather strip to seal the gaps.
It does not work for my door due to the glass in the door and it's not eligible for return. I wish I had known that before purchasing.
Looks like a great product. Unfortunately, I have a window in the middle of door which doesn’t leave enough room for the device to properly fit.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does not angle your Ring Doorbell away from the trim.
reviews.reviewText: Reason the above is important is at night the IR bounces off the trim and causes a very bright looking spot in the camera. Not sure if something were to be in the spot if it would detect it or not. Would be nice if the wedge could be used in this holder. If it can please enlighten me and it would be a 5 star.
